dcterms:description: Dataset R12-A consists of white raw plenoptic images acquired at different apertures using a light diffuser, along with free-hand calibration target images acquired at various poses for calibration and evaluation.
dcterms:title: R12-A

dcterms:description: Dataset R12-B includes white raw plenoptic images taken at different apertures and free-hand calibration target images for calibration and evaluation.
dcterms:title: R12-B

dcterms:description: Dataset R12-C consists of white raw plenoptic images acquired at different apertures and free-hand calibration target images for calibration and evaluation.
dcterms:title: R12-C

dcterms:description: Dataset R12-D includes white raw plenoptic images taken at different apertures and free-hand calibration target images for calibration and evaluation.
dcterms:title: R12-D

dcterms:description: The UPC-S dataset is a simulated dataset composed of several white images taken at different apertures, various checkerboard poses for calibration and validation, and checkerboard images with known translation for evaluation.
dcterms:title: UPC-S
